title: 246C.13 MINNESOTA SEX OFFENDER PROGRAM.
text: The Direct Care and Treatment executive board shall establish and maintain the Minnesota Sex Offender Program. The program shall provide specialized sex offender assessment, diagnosis, care, treatment, supervision, and other services to civilly committed sex offenders as defined in section 246B.01, subdivision 1a. Services may include specialized programs at secure treatment facilities as defined in section 253D.02, subdivision 13, consultative services, aftercare services, community-based services and programs, transition services, or other services consistent with the mission of Direct Care and Treatment.
